tasks.label: Build
tasks.command: rm -f ${workspaceFolder}/build/zephyr/zephyr.elf && source /venv/bin/activate && west update && west build app -- -G'Unix Makefiles'

tasks.label: Run QEMU
tasks.command: echo 'QEMU started'; qemu-system-arm -cpu cortex-m3 -machine mps2-an385 -netdev tap,id=mynet0,ifname=virbr0-nic,script=no -net nic,macaddr=52:54:00:12:34:AD,model=lan9118,netdev=mynet0 -nographic -gdb tcp::1234 -S -kernel ${workspaceFolder}/build/homo_final.elf
